org.codice.ddf.spatial.kml.transformer

Class KMLTransformerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codice.ddf.spatial.kml.transformer.KMLTransformerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MetacardTransformer, QueryResponseTransformer, KMLTransformer

    public class KMLTransformerImpl
extends Object
implements KMLTransformer
    The base Transformer for handling KML requests to take a Metacard or SourceResponse and produce a KML representation. This service attempts to first locate a KMLEntryTransformer for a given Metacard based on the metadata-content-type. If no KMLEntryTransformer can be found, the default transformation is performed.
    Author:
    Ashraf Barakat, Ian Barnett, Keith C Wire
